title: "What are the Three Inner Steps for Real Development and Quantum Coaching?"
first_phrase: This article discusses a three-step approach to personal development based on an ancient tradition of magnetic hypnotism updated to the most modern quantum technologies. The first step involves creating a clear mind, followed by grasping the first level quantum view of reality, and culminates in the third step of enhancing the inner fire. At this level, the techniques directed towards the center of oneself lead to complete transformation beyond the meaning of these words. The article also introduces the Academic Master Research Project, which gives trainees the opportunity to combine all their studies into a recognized personal master research and development project.
content: This awareness must be a daily awareness, not just a glimpse. Step 3 – enhancing the inner fire. At level three, the participant is now ready to learn the techniques directed towards the center of himself, in a direction that is the complete transformation of the individual. This is climbing the ladder of personal development beyond even the meaning of these words. We go in touch with a superior state of reality and consciousness. The ancient called this step enhancing the sulphur, as sulphur contains in itself the root of fire. The techniques of this level cannot be exposed to words as they require the knowledge of the earlier steps to be understood. These three steps and their succession comes from a centuries old tradition, whose goal is bringing back man to himself. ACADEMIC MASTER RESEARCH PROJECT Our work will have a bigger value, if done in contact with the reality and part of a bigger project. The trainee can realize and have all his studies become a recognized part of a Personal Master Research and Development Project. People wanting to do the Master Research Project are the people that in the future will most spread these techniques. CAIRN is an academic consortium and ISI-CNV is part of it. It will recognize credits to this project and give a doctorate or a recognition. This doctorate is based in Nepal. Cairn has a list of about 30 professors that can try to endorse it in different countries, but we cannot guarantee it always. So please take this certificate more as an endorsement of your work if your country doesn’t recognize it.
last_phrase: In conclusion, the Magnetic Path offers a unique approach to personal development through three levels: enhancing the inner fire, exploring the secrets of fascination and achieving presence and alchemy of the light. These techniques and practices cannot be explained fully in words and require personal experience and commitment. Moreover, the Magnetic Institute offers internationally recognized certifications and promotes the establishment of research and operational branches globally. The school also presents unique and powerful technologies, including magnetic massage, quantum psi, and Luxmind, to help individuals enhance their personal and professional lives. This program requires daily and active engagement, and participants can achieve the highest levels of consciousness and personal potential.
